name: Librateric DAB-LS Powder (MB)
description: Librateric DAB-LS Powder (MB) is a free-flowing powdered betaine with high activity (>92%) and low salt content. It is manufactured from a refined C12 fatty acid sourced from non-GMO RSPO (MB) palm kernel oil. This low-odor, white, free-flowing powder is an excellent choice for a wide range of applications, including toothpaste, soap bars, bath bars, body wash, shampoo bars, and shaving bars, thanks to its mildness. It is also suitable for use in foaming toilet blocks, laundry detergents, and surface cleaners.

Synonyms: Amphoteric L, Dodecanamidopropyl Betaine, Lauramido Propyl Betaine, Lauroylamide Propylbetaine
